SCTX:
begin MoveTriolith

float timer
short On

if (MenuMode == 0)

   if (OnActivate == 1)

      if (On == 0)
         set timer to 0
         set On to 1
		PlaySound3Dvp "Door Stone Open" 1.0 1.0
      endif

   endif

   if (On == 1)

      set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

      if (timer <=4)                                             ; sink Triolith
         move z, -11
      elseif (timer > 4)
         set On to 2

      endif

   endif

endif

end   ; MoveTriolith
